attributes.action: Improve aid in Afghanistan for the impoverished children and families dying of malnutrition
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
I was spurred on to start this petition after I read the Peter Greste article on the BBC News website, which stated that malnutrition amongst Afghan civilians was at an all-time high: http://news.bbc.co.uk/1/hi/world/south_asia/8440542.stm

As a result I urge the Government to be accountable for it's actions, for if it states one of the main reasons for being there is to improve the social and economical stability of Afghanistan, it must do all it can to prevent its population from dying of malnutrition. 

Please will you improve the level of aid given to the people of Afghanistan?
